Caustic.h

This file defines the published interface for talking to the Caustic Renderer.  This include is usually the top level include that clients will use.

Caustic
namespace
Caustic
ISampler

Defines a sampler. Samplers define how the underlying texture is accessed by shaders.

Functions
GetFilter
virtual D3D11_FILTER GetFilter() = 0

Returns the current filter state

SetFilter
virtual void SetFilter(
D3D11_FILTER filter
) = 0

Set the current filter state

Parameters
filter
D3D11_FILTER

filter state to set

D3D11_TEXTURE_ADDRESS_MODE mode
) = 0

Set the current addressing mode in the U direction

Parameters

D3D11_TEXTURE_ADDRESS_MODE

addressing mode to set

Render
virtual void Render(
IGraphics *pGraphics,
int slot
) = 0

Sets up the sampler for the current rendering

Parameters

IGraphics*

slot
